installDockerInstructions.linux: Follow instructions on configuring Docker on Linux
installDockerInstructions.windows: Follow instructions on configuring Docker on Windows. After the installation it is recommended to allocate at least 8GB memory in the Docker Desktop settings.
installDockerInstructions.macOS: Follow instructions on configuring Docker on macOS. After the installation it is recommended to allocate at least 8GB memory in the Docker Desktop settings.
